title: WYZE 2K HDR Rechargeable Battery Outdoor/Indoor Security Camera, Color Night Vision, Integrated Spotlight & Siren, Wire Free, 2-Way Audio - White, 1-Pack
description: The all-new upgraded Wyze Battery Cam Pro is the ultimate go anywhere, see anything security camera. Why? For starters, it has officially ended a lengthy and unhealthy codependency with its hub. Yes, this camera operates wire-free and HUB FREE, and runs on long-lasting removable, and rechargeable Li-Ion batteries. That means you can place it exactly where you want without hassle or worry of outlet restrictions. Upgraded 2K HDR video with Color Night Vision provides enhanced clarity, day or night. All that, plus a motion-activated, integrated spotlight and siren means you might have found our most powerful and versatile outdoor security camera yet. Outdoor power adapter sold separately.
